action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image shows a plate of food consisting of a piece of grilled chicken, mashed potatoes with green herbs, and broccoli. The plate is placed on a table with a fork and knife on the right side. The background is a beige tablecloth.

DESCRIPTION: The image shows a plate of food consisting of a grilled steak, roasted potatoes, broccoli, carrots, and a slice of lemon. The plate is placed on a colorful tablecloth, and there is a fork and knife on the table next to the plate.
